document.heading: Portable Electronics Insurance Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-306, the “Portable Electronics Insurance Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-986. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 2012, and December 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 5, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-673 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-306 became effective on May 1, 2013.
